name: Corporate Ladder - Preview
description:
Corporate Ladder is a text-based role playing game that puts the player in the shoes of an intern at corporate monolith Voltarin. On their first day, a strange envelope appears on their desk with an invitation to meet with a mysterious stranger, E. 

E asks the player for their help in taking down Voltarin for good. If the player accepts, they must allow E to have complete control over their actions and do exactly as they say. The player must work their way from intern to CEO before it's too late. 

**This is only a preview version of Corporate Ladder**
